comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Likely posted to announce her (untimely) death: FLORENCE SCHENCK DEAD.; Girl Who Eloped with Charles Wilson [identified as "Alfred Vanderbilt's whip" in the article] Passes Away at Norfolk. Special to The New York Times. January 5, 1914, Monday Page 1, 189 words

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: More about her in Omaha daily bee., February 01, 1914, PART TWO, Image 20

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for finding these great resources.  What a story!  We'll fill in a few details next time we update the record.
